PREFIX.description: Prefix of your bot Ex: - , / , # , & etc. Put anythong except @

SESSION_ID.description: A random string for your bot session. Which works as an OTP to get qr code. And you have to chane sessioon every time to get a new qr.

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma "," Ex: 918101187835,929864781259 )

MONGODB.description: Your MOngoDB URL. If you don't have any read PublicKeys.md to get a public MongoDB URL. Or copy paste it: mongodb+srv://fantox001:zjmbvgwr52@cluster0.qh05pl9.mongodb.net/?retryWrites=true&w=majority
